--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Shane Mingins <shanemingins@y...> wrote:
> --- christina_norwood <christina_norwood@b...>
> wrote:
> 
> > I have tried to use Java Web Start to download
> > JUnit.jar and run the 
> > Swing TestRunner.  
> 
> I am kind of curious ... why are you doing this?
> 
I am looking at ways to enable unit testing (and other java 
applications) for some fairly inexperienced users.  I've had problems 
with web start with another small application I developed too, so I'm 
exploring it's limits.
